title: Video: Porcelain Raft – Put Me To Sleep
body:
My first real confrontation with **[Porcelain Raft](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12255-new-porcelain-raft-put-me-to-sleep/ "New: Porcelain Raft – Put Me To Sleep")** was in St. Pancreas church back in March of this year. The set, for want of a better phrase, was ‘fucking fantasic’, with **Mauro Remiddi** leaving the crowds’ jaws literally hanging in the now legendary London space.

Since then, he’s been picked up by **Secretly Canadian**, has an album due out early next year and most importantly, he’s still making damagingly emotionally music. His new video sees Remiddi drowning in a bath of milk. It’s a humbling and uncomfortable watch.

_Strange Weekend_ comes out through Secretly Canadian on January 24th.
